Name: Soul Siphon
Story Background: In the darkest corners of the Multiverse, necromancers harness the power of souls to fuel their dark magic.
Ability: Target opponent sacrifices a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's power.
Appearance Description: The card art depicts a shadowy figure reaching out to extract a ghostly essence from a terrified creature. The background is dimly lit with eerie blue hues, emphasizing the ominous nature of the spell.
